data.text: I am Habakkuk, a prophet. This is the message that Yahweh gave to me in a vision.
I said, “Yahweh, how long must I continue to call to you for help
◄Must I/I do not want to► continue seeing people doing what is unjust [RHQ].
The soldiers of Babylonia are fierce/cruel and swift.
They are people whom others fear very much [DOU],
The horses that pull their chariots go faster than leopards,
They make fun of kings and princes of other countries,
They rush past like the wind,
Then I said, “Yahweh, you have certainly [RHQ] always/forever been God.
You [SYN] are pure, and you cannot endure looking at what is evil,
Do you consider that we are like fish in the sea,
The soldiers of Babylonia think that we are fish [RHQ] for them to pull out of the sea with hooks
If they catch us, they will worship their weapons [MET] with which they captured us, and offer sacrifices to them
Will you allow them to continue to conquer people [MET] forever?
